summary: A unit‑test suite that verifies the behavior of the class‑mapping utility, ensuring it can construct mappings from different inputs, manage optional color data, handle category indices, and retrieve class entries correctly, including proper error handling.
business_intent: Validate the correctness and robustness of the class map component used in raster‑vision workflows, guaranteeing accurate class identification, color assignment, and category handling for downstream image analysis tasks.
